content:
Hello,

I searched for similar functionality in other email clients and found that Outlook offers a feature called "Light Reading Pane" under the "View" menu.

I tried to find a similar option in Thunderbird, but I couldn’t locate it. Is there a way to toggle the light background for the message pane in Thunderbird?

Thank you!
creator: NoSyu

content: Po kliknutí na zprávu se ti nezobrazuje nabídka možností?
creator: poljos-moz
